justification: The candidate lacks any direct project management experience in data management or analytics, impacting macro scores.
No evidence of Agile or SCRUM methodology implementation noted, affecting meeting requirements.
PowerBI or similar tool expertise not demonstrated, affecting micro scores.
Experience primarily in marketing and business development unrelated to job description focus.

requirements.criteria: 10+ years of industry experience in project management and data analytics
Experience in managing enterprise data warehouse projects
Strong understanding of Agile and SCRUM methodologies
Master's degree in Computer Science, Business Administration, or related field
Proficiency in using analytical software and tools like PowerBI and Oracle DV

input.job_description:
Join **TechVentures Inc.** as a **Senior Project Manager** where you'll oversee the delivery of key data management and analytics projects. We are looking for an innovative leader who can set and uphold delivery standards, while managing cross-functional teams to achieve the highest levels of service excellence. Your expertise in pre-sales, solution architecture, and client relationship management will drive our expansion into new markets and optimize existing processes.

### Key Responsibilities:
- Lead and manage complex data analytics and management projects from inception through completion.
- Develop and implement quality and project management systems to align with organizational goals.
- Coordinate solutions architecture and pre-sales activities, including the preparation of RFPs and EOIs.
- Mentor and guide junior team members in professional development and project execution.
- Engage with clients to deliver tailored business solutions and improve customer satisfaction.
- Collaborate with other departments to identify improvement opportunities and streamline processes.

### Preferred Skills:
- Proficiency in data tools such as PowerBI, Oracle DV, and Tableau.
- Strong understanding of software development methodologies including Agile and SCRUM.
- Demonstrated ability to lead large technical teams and handle stakeholder communications effectively.
- Expertise in business intelligence implementation and enterprise data warehousing.

### Why Join Us?
- Opportunity to work on impactful projects with global reach.
- Collaborative and inclusive work environment.
- Continuous learning and professional development opportunities.

Become a part of a team that values integrity, excellence, and innovation, and help us redefine what's possible in the tech industry.
input.additional_info: Preferred universities include National University of Computer and Emerging Sciences in Pakistan and equivalent institutions. We offer relocation support for candidates based outside of the hiring city, subject to management approval. Skills are assessed through a combination of technical tests, project management case studies, and panel interviews consisting of departmental heads and HR representatives.
minimum_requirements: 10+ years of industry experience in project management and data analytics
Experience in managing enterprise data warehouse projects
Strong understanding of Agile and SCRUM methodologies
Master's degree in Computer Science, Business Administration, or related field
Proficiency in using analytical software and tools like PowerBI and Oracle DV

details.name: Zaid Hameed

education.degree_title: MBA - Master of Business Administration in Marketing and Finance
BBA - Bachelor of Business Administration in Marketing and Finance

details.executive_summary: Zaid Hameed is a marketing and business development professional with extensive experience in content development, copywriting, and digital marketing strategies. He has a proven track record in customer acquisition and retention, utilizing various channels including social media and email marketing to drive business growth.

employment_history.details: Content development and implementation through channels that include social platforms, email campaigns, and the company website. Prospecting and lead generation through selected channels mainly, LinkedIn. Analyzing traffic and lead generation avenues through Google Analytics and Search Console. Research, strategize & implement marketing strategy to optimize the lead generation cycle. Ensuring a smooth and timely onboarding process while forming SOPs to ensure best practices. Discovery meeting with customers to analyze their business case and suggest the most effective solution. Demonstration of our solutions in order to train our business partners and customers. Managing the CRM for pricing and other commercial aspects including Statement of Work (SOW). Updating the official website through the Content Management System that includes basic HTML and CSS. Coordinate with the support and technical team to ensure the business need is communicated properly as well as to ensure a smooth installation process. Use customer feedback to improve solutions and keep up with the market trends. Ideate and deliver on video marketing collateral.

Prospecting and lead generation narrowed down to the market with respect to the company portfolio, managing CRM, following-up and reporting to the higher management. Coordinate with the Development Department to come up with the technical and financial proposals. Identify and segment markets to devise marketing strategies, content and offerings. Coordinating with the Research and Development team to enhance products further.

Created the social media strategy for the promotion of Punjab as a preferred investment destination. Ran ad campaigns on Facebook, LinkedIn and Google with an above average CTR and an extremely low CPC. Preparing presentations for the incoming delegations from across the globe tailored specifically to their investment needs. Conducted research on different economic sectors to identify and highlight the various investment opportunities. Conducted business development activities for the Pak – Iran Fair at the Expo Center.
